Following are analysts' comments on his decision and its implications for Prime Minister David Cameron : OPPOSITION Labor PARTY LEADER Ed Miliband Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him. We think he should have gone earlier. He has now done the right thing. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment, about hanging on to him as long as he did. The money you make on American TV is huge, but there's also a huge risk.''*** The way American contracts are gives Fox the chance to opt out if viewers don't take to her. But Simon Cowell won't let that happen. As soon as it's announced she's going to be a judge the plan will be to launch her music career in the States. It's important Americans realize she's a credible music star if she's going to be judging other singers. *** Simon Cowell is said to be trying to find a way for him and Cole to carry on starring in the British version of the show alongside the US program.
